short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a random compliment to brighten your day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you feeling down or stressed? Do you need a little boost of positivity? Look no further than the Random Compliment Generator Chrome extension!

With this extension, you can generate a random compliment to brighten your day. The extension features three categories of compliments: general, work, and friendship. You can select the category before generating a compliment to receive a personalized message that fits your situation.

The Random Compliment Generator is perfect for anyone who needs a little pick-me-up throughout the day. Whether you're at work, at home, or on-the-go, you can easily generate a compliment with just a click of a button. The extension is simple and easy to use, making it a great addition to your daily routine.

Install the Random Compliment Generator Chrome extension today and let the positivity flow!
